name: Classic Archery - Bow & Arrow
description:
Classic Archery - Bow & Arrow is a Single-Tap Hyper Casual game that will keep you engaged for hours.

How to play :
- Shoot the arrow through single tap
- Make sure the arrow hits the spinning wheel
- If the arrow hits another arrow then the game gets over.
- Number of available arrows are written on center of spinning wheel.

Now you can play this game in your free time and enjoy.
